items.sentence: It turns out that that house is infested with garter snakes. They're everywhere.
When she returned home from school, she began to help her mother in the kitchen.
I didn't mean to imply that there was something wrong with the way you did that.
If we cut down these three trees, we could probably see the lake from our porch.
I know exactly what you're talking about, but I can't remember what it's called.
